ygData.subject: Re: Runed Totem Staff
ygData.msgSnippet: I have found a Runed Totem staff to be handy in a few areas. a - When I am OOM and just need to put the beats to something that wont kill me in melee first. b
ygData.messageBody:
I have found a Runed Totem staff to be handy in a few areas.

a - When I am OOM and just need to put the beats to something that wont kill
me in melee first.
b - When I am OOM in a group fighting magical monster and need to put the
beats to it
c - When I am OOM solo fighting a magical monster and need to put the beats
to it.

Basicly I only use my staff when I am OOM and need to put the beats to
something *grin*

But trust me, when you start to whack at ghouls and wisps and lurking
mummies and you and your group ends up OOM, you will find that staff very
handy, also the lower delay and higher attack value over a woren staff is a
nice addition. Also, if you find yourself in a group where a melee-damager
type guy has the 2HB skill but no magic weapon, it can be handy to toss it
over to them if you trust that they will indeed return it.

>From: "Larimus La'shain" <larimus@...>
>
>After many levels of wishing I finally got my Runed Totem Staff for
>the bargan basement price of 13 pp (though I'm quite broke now).
>However it isn't as effective as I thought. Anything that is tough
>enough to need a good damage weapon I generally can't hit ( I believe
>my 2h blunt is maxed ) and anything that isn't that tough I can nuke
>in no time.
>
>So my question is should I sell it for 20 pp and buy more of my ranks
>spells ( i'm level 12 and only have Shock of Lightning and bind
>affinity ) If so which spells should I buy? Or should I stick with
>the staff. Just want some friendly advice.
>
>TIA
>
